name: Self-Destruct Sequence
description:
A tricky puzzle game about destroying your own pieces

Go through 20 primary levels and 4 special levels, destroying every single one of your units the whole way through. Eliminate every piece you have, and find the right sequence to self-destruct.

Controls:

  • Left Click - Select / Move
  • Space - Restart
  • Escape - Exit to menu / Exit game

Made in 3 days for the Wowie Jam 3.0

Theme: Failure is Progress

Music by Abstraction

Three Red Hearts - Deep Blue

http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/

http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
